alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 24 at 11:04AM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. East winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The combination of snow and considerable blowing snow resulting from moderate to strong easterly winds will result in dangerous conditions. These winds will also result in wind chill values near zero late tonight. Delay travel or consider alternative routes. If travel is necessary, slow down and allow for extra time.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.
